quran-desc: By the core developers of Quran.com, comes the beautiful and ad-free mushaf iOS and Android apps. Itâ€™s now easier to read the Quran on the go, memorize it, and listen to your favorite reciters.
tarteel-desc: Tarteel is the first Quran app to use AI tools to interact with your recitation and highlight mistakes. A voice-led Quran companion in the palm of your hands, Tarteel works intuitively to help you read, recite, memorize and understand the Quran with confidence!<0></0><0></0>Tarteel is proud to be a core developer of Quran.com as well as a member of their board of governance.
